name: Light Vs Dark
description:
Play the popular classic strategy game of disc flipping in 3D.

Use your skills and place your chips on the board to strategically beat your opponent.

With 10 difficulty levels, can you master them all and beat The Grand Master!

Features:

► Interactive 3D board: Rotate, Zoom and view & play from any angle
► 10 AI difficulty settings, from Beginner to Grand Master
► Turn interactive camera on/off
► Undo & Redo all moves
► Stuck?, use the hint feature to show all available moves
► "How to Play" tutorial, showing all the rules
► 2 Player game on the same device
► Game statistics for each difficulty level
► No Ads or In-App Purchases

For technical support, feature requests and general feedback, join our forums:

► http://forum.afterdarkstudios.co.uk/
